document.docAuthor: El-Hawagry, Magdi S. & Al Dhafer, Hathal M.
document.masterDocTitle: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax
Scopoli, 1763 : 358
. Type species:
Musca morio Linnaeus, 1758
, by monotypy.

subSubSection.paragraph: Hosts: Larvae and pupae of bees, wasps, Mymeleontidae and Cicindellidae ( Hull 1973 ; Yeates & Greathead 1997 ).

bibRefCitation.author: El-Hawagry, M. S. & Khalil, M. W. & Sharaf, M. R. & Fadl, H. H. & Aldawood, A. S.
bibRefCitation.refString: El-Hawagry, M. S., Khalil, M. W., Sharaf, M. R., Fadl, H. H. & Aldawood, A. S. (2013) A preliminary study on the insect fauna of Al-Baha Province, Saudi Arabia, with descriptions of two new species. ZooKeys, 274, 1 - 88 https: // doi. org / 10.3897 / zookeys. 274.4529

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax alruqibi El-Hawagry in
El-Hawagry et al ., 2013
: 55
. Type locality: Saudi Arabia .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”].
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Al-Mekhwa City, Aqabet Al-Baha-Tihama (Al-Mekhwa Gov.), Ghabet Raghdan, Ghabet Shahba ( Al-Baha Gov.).
Dates of collection: March to June.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Argyramoeba chionanthrax
Bezzi, 1926 : 265
. Type locality: Egypt .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”]. PA: Egypt , Israel .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Al-Mekhwa City (Al-Mekhwa Gov.).
Dates of collection: March and April.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Argyromoeba dentata
Becker, 1906 : 148
. Type locality: Tunisia .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Aldabra, Chad , Eritrea , Kenya , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Tanzania , Yemen (incl. Socotra ). PA: Algeria , Andorra , Egypt , Hungary , Israel , Italy (incl. Sicily ), Libya , Malta , Morocco , Palestine ( West Bank ), Spain , Tunisia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Asir : Raydah Protected Area (Abha Gov.).
Dates of collection: June.

Anthrax ricardoae Greathead, 2003
( Fig. 9 )
Argyromoeba fuscipennis Ricardo, 1903 : 366
. Type locality: Yemen (Sokotra). [Preoccupied by Macquart, 1834 .].
Anthrax ricardoae Greathead, 2003 : 91
(new replacement name for Argyromoeba fuscipennis Ricardo ). Distribution: AF: Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Yemen (Sokotra). PA: Saudi Arabia . Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Baljurash City (Baljurashi Gov.), Ghabet Raghdan ( Al-Baha Gov.), Ghabet
Shahba ( Al-Baha Gov.). Asir : Raydah Protected Area (Abha Gov.). Haiel: Al-Nefud, 20 km SW of Haiel,

Leheb (Haiel Gov.). Jazan : Abu-Arish (Abu-Arish Gov.).
Makkah :
40 miles S of Jeddah
( Jeddah Gov.)
.

Riyadh : Wadi Hanifa ( Riyadh Gov.). Dates of collection: February to October
.

Anthrax sticticus Klug, 1832
( Fig. 10 )

Anthrax stictica Klug, 1832
: pl. 30, fig. 14. Type locality: Saudi Arabia .

Distribution: AF: Chad , Eritrea , Guinea-Bissau , Nigeria , Oman , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Senegal . PA: Afghanistan , Armenia , Azerbaijan , Cyprus , Egypt , Greece , Gruzia , Iran , Israel , Italy , Kyrgyz Republic , Macedonia , Palestine ( West Bank ), Syria , Tajikistan , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan , former Yugoslavia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Al-Mekhwa City, Jabal Shada Al A’Ala Protected Area (Al-Mekhwa Gov.). Asir : Raydah Protected Area (Abha Gov.).
Dates of collection: March to July.

bibRefCitation.author: Egger
bibRefCitation.refString: Egger J (1859) Dipterologische Beitrage. Verhandlungen der Kaiserlich-Konigliche Zoologisch-botanischen Gesellschaft in Wien, 9, 387 - 407.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax virgo
Egger, 1859 : 396
. Type locality: Italy ( Sicily ).

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: PA: Albania , Algeria , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Bulgaria , Croatia , France , Greece , Gruzia , Hungary , Israel , Italy (incl. Sicily ), Libya , Malta , Morocco , Saudi Arabia , Spain , Tunisia , Turkey .
Saudi Arabian localities: Tabuk : 50 km SE of Haql (Haql Gov.).
Dates of collection: March.
